ValidationRule.description: Core Orders cannot be created with a Negative Amount.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( /*ISBLANK(Opportunity.SBQQ__AmendedContract__c),*/ AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__Quote__c)), NOT(CONTAINS( TEXT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBCF_Order_Type__c), 'Return'))), /* no RMA lines */ TEXT(Opportunity.Business_Group__c) = 'Core', Opportunity.Amount < 0), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For New/Renewal Core Quotes, you can't create an Order with a negative Amount.
